00059 static int s_tag_assigner = 0;
00064 #define ctk_dma_new_tag() \
00065     (s_tag_assigner = (s_tag_assigner & 0xf), s_tag_assigner++)

00121 
00129 static inline int ctk_dma_wait(ctk_spe_t spe, int tag) __attribute__((always_inline)); 
00130 static inline int
00131 ctk_dma_wait(ctk_spe_t spe, int tag)
00132 {
00133     return ctk_dma_wait_all(spe, 1 << tag);
00134 }

00178 
00187 static inline int
00188 ctk_dma_get_block(ctk_spe_t spe, ls_addr_t ls_addr, void *ea_addr, dma_size_t size)
00189 {
00190     int tag = ctk_dma_new_tag();
00191     int ret = ctk_dma_get(spe, ls_addr, ea_addr, size, tag);
00192     if (ret == CTK_ERROR_SPE_NOT_RUNNING &&
00193         ctk_spe_get_status(spe) == CTK_SPE_STATUS_READY)
00194     {
00195         while (ctk_spe_get_status(spe) == CTK_SPE_STATUS_READY);
00196         ret = ctk_dma_get(spe, ls_addr, ea_addr, size, tag);
00197     }
00198     if (ret != 0) {
00199         trace_debug("ctk_dma_get failed (errno:%d)\n", errno);
00200         return ret;
00201     }
00202     return ctk_dma_wait(spe, tag);
00203 }
00204

00214 ctk_dma_getf_block(ctk_spe_t spe, ls_addr_t ls_addr, void *ea_addr, dma_size_t size)

00309 static inline int
00310 ctk_dma_put_block(ctk_spe_t spe, ls_addr_t ls_addr, void *ea_addr, dma_size_t size)
00311 {
00312     int tag = ctk_dma_new_tag();
00313     int ret = ctk_dma_put(spe, ls_addr, ea_addr, size, tag);
00314     if (ret == CTK_ERROR_SPE_NOT_RUNNING &&
00315         ctk_spe_get_status(spe) == CTK_SPE_STATUS_READY)
00316     {
00317         while (ctk_spe_get_status(spe) == CTK_SPE_STATUS_READY);
00318         ret = ctk_dma_put(spe, ls_addr, ea_addr, size, tag);
00319     }
00320     if (ret != 0) {
00321         trace_debug("ctk_dma_put failed (errno:%d)\n", errno);
00322         return ret;
00323     }
00324     return ctk_dma_wait(spe, tag);
00325 }
